How can I download the Verus bootstrap?
You can download the Verus bootstrap from the Verus bootstrap website ([https://bootstrap.verus.io](https://bootstrap.verus.io)).

com/VerusCoin/Verus-Desktop/releases)
Wallet: [CLI wallet releases](https://github.com/VerusCoin/VerusCoin/releases/)
